mission.title: Wagamama
mission.text1:
Looking for the best Japanese-inspired restaurant in Birmingham, Michigan or searching for top sushi near Bloomfield Hills, Royal Oak, or West Bloomfield? Wagamama, located in the historic Victorian Peabody Mansion, has become a luxury dining destination for guests across Metro Detroit and Oakland County. Known for elevated Japanese cuisine and sophisticated ambiance, Wagamama attracts diners who appreciate quality, style, and culinary artistry—earning its reputation as one of the best sushi restaurants in Michigan.

    Our culinary team blends years of expertise with innovative technique, creating a menu that features premium sashimi and nigiri flown in fresh from Japan, alongside artfully crafted small plates, large-format dishes, and signature cocktails. Every ingredient is intentionally selected from both local and international purveyors, reflecting our commitment to refinement and exceptional taste in every detail.
mission.text2:
Wagamama stands apart by merging fine dining with a social, vibrant energy. The elegant dining room, lively sushi lounge, and polished cocktail bar create a stylish atmosphere where each visit feels memorable and curated. Guests from Birmingham, Bloomfield Hills, Royal Oak, Troy, Detroit, Clawson, Franklin, Clarkston, and West Bloomfield make Wagamama their go-to destination for upscale sushi and modern Japanese dining.

Whether you're joining us for a romantic evening, a business dinner, a private celebration, or a night out with friends, Wagamama delivers world-class hospitality and an unforgettable culinary experience. Come see why guests throughout Metro Detroit say the drive is worth it—and why Wagamama continues to set the standard for luxury sushi dining in Michigan.
